title: Please I have a paid problem!
body: I wanted to add to my account LJVIM0RTAL 25 E .. I added .. and when I wanted to buy skin ... I selected without the slightest intention .. changing regions on Oceania ... and I have 30e to change dinou region but can not pay in euro .. than in AUD .. if you can help me! please !!

replies.body: Not too sure how you'd accidentally switch servers (sounds like that's what happened?) since it's in a completely different part of the store, but player support is your best chance at a resolution here: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
